description: Lifecycle hooks for claude-spec projects (requires uv: https://docs.astral.sh/uv/)

hooks.command: command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1 && uv run --directory ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT} python ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/session_start.py || echo '[cs-plugin] ERROR: uv not installed. Install: curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh' >&2
command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1 && uv run --directory ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT} python ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/command_detector.py || true
command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1 && uv run --directory ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT} python ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/prompt_capture.py || true
command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1 && uv run --directory ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT} python ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/trigger_memory.py || true
command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1 && uv run --directory ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT} python ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/post_tool_capture.py || true
command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1 && uv run --directory ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT} python ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/post_command.py || true
